title: JUNG KOOK: I AM STILL > THE ORIGINAL
overview: In the 2020s, JUNG KOOK emerged as a top solo artist. He won over audiences with chart-topping hits like "Seven," "3D," and "Standing Next to You." To this day, he still gives his all to make ARMY proud, and is constantly striving to improve and evolve. Instead of resting on his laurels with his natural talent and impressive career, he continues to blaze his own trail. From his solo career launch single to the promotion of his album GOLDEN, experience eight months of Jung Kook's golden life as he travels the globe, visiting cities like New York, London, and Seoul. This is the story of Jung Kook, an artist who never stops dreaming.
